column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Best ramen I've had by far!  Even on a busy Saturday evening
column2: the service was wonderful and the quality of food never suffers.  Both times I've been there
column3: I've had an attentive and efficient server and the ramen has been out of this world.  Parking is on the street but I've never had a problem finding parking
column4: furthest I've parked on a busy night was two blocks away.
